scripts.build: mkdir -p ./dist && cp .env ./dist/.env && tsc -p ./tsconfig.json && tsc-alias -p ./tsconfig.json && yarn post-build
scripts.build:docker: mkdir -p ./dist && cp .env.example ./dist/.env && tsc -p ./tsconfig.json && tsc-alias -p ./tsconfig.json && yarn post-build
scripts.post-build: cp package.json ./dist/package.json && cp yarn.lock ./dist/yarn.lock && cd dist && env NODE_ENV=production yarn install
